markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 0"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Grappling Bolt](/Equipment.aspx?ID=872)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 115</row>

**Price** 2 sp

<row gap="medium">

**Hands** 1

**Bulk** L
</row>

**Access** Member of the Pathfinder Society.

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This small [grappling hook](/Equipment.aspx?ID=23) is designed to be tied to a rope and fired from a crossbow. When fired, it has half the normal range increment for the weapon.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Grappling Bolt
